lines.text: Did I ever tell ya that this here jacket represents a symbol of my individuality, and my belief in personal freedom?
About fifty thousand times.
This whole world's wild at heart and weird on top.
You look like a clown in that stupid jacket.
This is a snakeskin jacket! And for me it's a symbol of my individuality, and my belief... in personal freedom.
Asshole.
C'mere.
I'm making my lunch!
You got me hotter than Georgia asphalt.
That Johnnie is one clever detective. You know how clever?
How clever?
He told me once he could find an honest man in Washington.

My dog barks, some. Mentally you picture my dog, but I have not told you the type o' dog which I have. Perhaps you might even picture Toto... from "The Wizard of Oz." But I can tell you, my dog is all ways with me. ARF!
When'd you start smoking, Sail?
I guess I started smoking when I was about... four. My momma was already dead then from lung cancer.
Man, I had a boner with a capital "O".
I'd like to apologize to you gentlemen for referring to you all as homosexuals. You taught me a valuable lesson in life.
She turns over, peels off them orange pants, spreads her legs real wide and says to me..."Take a bite of Peach."
Stab it and steer.
Don't turn away from love, Sailor.
Sing. Don't cry.
You want me to shoot Sailor... in the brains... with a gun?
Yes.
In the forehead?
Yes.
Wrong. It's always better to blow a hole through the back of the head, right through to the bridge of the nose. Lots of irreparable brain damage.
Those toenails dry yet, sweetheart? We got some dancin' to do.
Marietta tells me you been tryin to fuck her in the toilet for the past ten minutes... How 'bout that, tryin to fuck your girl's mama... Tell me, what's that little cunt Lula think about that?
Uh-oh.
One of these days the sun's gonna come up and burn a hole clean through the planet like a giant electrical x-ray.
I wouldn't worry about that, Peanut. By then people'll prob'ly be drivin Buicks to the moon.

[stumbling into men's room with a martini]
Yoo-hoo! Sailor boy! How would you like to fuck Lula's momma?
Uh, no ma'am, I sure don't...
Lula's momma would like to fuck you. Come on.
Ms. Fortune, I really think you need a cup of coffee. I really do.
Uh oh. Baby, you'd better get me back to that hotel. You got me hotter than Georgia asphalt.

Ya know, I sure do like a girl with nice tits like yours who talks tough and looks like she can fuck like a bunny. Do you fuck like that? Cause if ya do, I'll fuck ya good. Like a big ol' jackrabbit bunny, jump all around that hole. Bobby Peru don't come up for air.
Speaking of Jack, One eyed Jack's yearning to go a peeping in a seafood store!
[Sailor's gun doesn't fire]
It's full of dummies, dummy!

[to Lula]
The way your head works is God's own private mystery.
I gotta take a piss bad, can I use your head?
Uh... yeah, I guess.
I don't mean your head-head. I'm not gonna piss on your head, your hair and all, I'm just gonna piss in the toilet. Y'all take a listen, you'll hear the deep sound comin' down from Bobby Peru.
Say cheese!
[Shoots bank employee]
Cool it man!
You're next... fucker!
[Sailor's gun doesn't fire]
Those are... dummies... dummy!

[Sailor talking about Lula's Cousin Dell]
Too bad he couldn't visit that old Wizard of Oz, and get some good advice.
Too bad we all can't baby.

[shocked and bleeding]
I got bobby pin...
[showing a bobby pin]
It was bobby pin...

[looking for her wallet in her pocket]
I can't find it. My mother's gonna kill me. It's got all my cards in it, and it was in my pocket, and now my pocket's gone. Gotta help me find it, my mother's gonna kill me. It's got all my cards in it, and it was in my pocket. It was in my pocket...
[shouting]
My purse is gone! My purse is gone, now she tells me!
That ain't never will happen, baby. Least not in our lifetime.
My name's Bobby Peru, like the country.
Cheez Louise! Sailor, baby, you're really somethin'!
Rockin' good news.
Say it! I'll tear your fuckin' heart out, girl!
Buffalo hunting? I've gone buffalo huntin'? What the fuck does that mean? Buffalo huntin'!
It's Night of the Livin' fuckin' Dead!
The fuckah split!
